newsitem.title: USA: Montana Power sees Colstrip 4 up Sunday night.
newsitem.headline: Montana Power sees Colstrip 4 up Sunday night.

text.p: Montana Power Co said Friday the 700 megawatt (MW) Colstrip 4 coal-fired power unit, which was shut Thursday for maintenance, should be back on line by Sunday night.
The unit was taken off line for repairs to a generator part.
"It will be down for a few days. This is not a major or significant breakdown," said Montana Power spokesman Dean Conklin.
